snippet: Ai Weiwei, the Chinese artist and outspoken government critic, said in a text message Thursday that he and his colleagues had themselves "disconnected" a live Web camera operation from a Japanese server the previous day.
abstract: Ai Weiwei, the Chinese artist and outspoken government critic, said in a text message Thursday that he and his colleagues had themselves "disconnected" a live Web camera operation from a Japanese server the previous day.

headline.main: Ai Weiwei Says He Pulled the Plug on Webcams, on Police Orders
